messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 1140
messages.msgSnippet: They ve played GTA:Vice City and haven t wanted to go out and run people over either. Same here. I did tell the boys they might want to censor themselves
messages.messageBody:
"They've played GTA:Vice City and haven't wanted to go out and run people over
either."

Same here. I did tell the boys they might want to censor themselves around Grandparents and possibly their Dad, who can be a bit negative about video gaming at times.
Interestingly enough, the GTA games are the first ones dh has LIKED!! He thinks their cool and rolls his eyes about parent's freaking on the "darker" sides of the games. "It's just a game" he says....

Ren



"I never teach my pupils; I only attempt to provide the conditions in which they can learn."
Albert Einstein
